name: Dimex Office Chair Mat for Low Pile Carpet, 46" x 60", Clear
short_description: For Low Pile Carpet: Designed with a smooth top surface for easy chair movement and a cleated backing to grip carpet
Product Details: 46" x 60" rounded rectangle chair mat, suitable for small to mid-size work areas such as an apartment, dorm, or home office
Blends with Decor: Designed with industry-leading clarity to seamlessly fade into your floors
Sustainability: Proudly manufactured in the USA
product_description: Keep your carpeted floors looking new with Dimex Chair Mats. Specially designed with a traditional lip to protect your floors, this plastic mat is thoroughly tested and resistant to wear. A cleated backing grips carpet up to 1/4 (0.25) of an inch thick, and a smooth top surface allows for easy chair movement. Measuring 46 inches x 60 inches, this chair mat is perfect for small to mid-size office chairs. Industry leading clarity ensures your chair mat blends seamlessly with the floor underneath. Dimex chair mats for low pile carpets are intended to protect berber, loop, sisal, velour, and carpet tiles. Not recommended for use on hard floors, area rugs, throw rugs, or medium to high pile carpets. Tried and trusted for creating durable matting solutions, Dimex is a proud American manufacturer – providing products that will move you.

name: Chair Mat for Carpet, SALLOUS 46" x 60" Office Chair Mat for Carpeted Floors, Heavy Duty Vinyl Floor Mat with Grips, Floor Protector Computer Desk Mat for Home Office (Clear, Rectangular)
short_description: Premium Protection: Our chair mat is specially designed to protect your carpets from damage caused by chair wheels, reducing wear and tear over time. Suitable for LOW-PILE carpets, our chair mat is ideal for home offices, corporate workplaces, gaming rooms, and more.

Large Chair Mat for Low-Pile Carpets: Measuring a generous size of 46" x 60", this Chair Mat is perfect for larger office or gaming chairs, providing ample space for movement without worrying about damage to your carpeting.
Non-Slip Backing: The chair mat features a non-slip backing that keeps it securely in place on your carpet. Say goodbye to sliding mats and enjoy stability during your workday.

Enhanced Grip: Equipped with innovative grip technology, our chair mat offers superior grip between the mat and your chair's wheels. This ensures smooth gliding without any unwanted movement or slipping.

Better Stability: In order to ensure better stability on low-pile carpets, the nails of backing are slightly sharp. We have conducted several tests to ensure the best grip and safety, and the current sharpness is the optimal level. Please be cautious and prioritize safety while using the product.
SALLOUS Chair Mat for Gaming: Enjoy a seamless gaming experience without worrying about scratches or damage to your flooring with this large and sturdy Chair Mat that is perfect for gamers.
Easy to Clean: Cleaning the chair mat is a breeze! Simply wipe it down with a damp cloth or mild cleaner to remove any dirt or spills, keeping your workspace tidy and fresh.
100% QUALITY GUARANTEE: Should you have any additional questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.
PLS NOTE: Suitable for low-pile carpet, flat-pile carpet, or non-pile carpet, but it is not suitable for hard floors, medium-pile and high-pile carpets.

At 2.2 mm thick, the rolling chair mat for carpet acts as a dependable rug protector, blocking stains, dirt, casters, and heels so floors last longer. Molded cleats and studs keep these chair mats for carpeted floors immobile, while sturdy plastic resists cracking, chipping, or shattering during normal use. Anchor bars secure the piece even on dense carpeting; it is not intended for hard surfaces. The clear protector ships rolled—allow 48–72 hours for it to relax and flatten before use. Effortless Gliding & Secure Anti-Slip Grip：Polished edges prevent carpet snags, while four non-slip pads keep the mat firmly in place. Office chairs roll smoothly without sticking, reducing fatigue during long work sessions.

Universal Floor Protection for Any Surface：Works flawlessly on hardwood, tile, laminate, or low-pile carpet, shielding floors from dents and scratches. The neutral design complements any interior style—home offices, studios, or corporate spaces.

Easy Cleaning & Lifetime Warranty for Peace of Mind：Just wipe clean with a damp cloth—no harsh chemicals or scrubbing needed. Backed by a lifetime warranty, InfiniGlass is a worry-free investment in durability and timeless elegance.
